name: birthx-birthbot
description: BirthBot is an AI powered sms-based chatbot that deliveries pregnancy, birth, and postpartum education on a customized schedule and allows you to ask any questions pertaining to those subjects at any time of the day.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-client && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently -n 'server, client' -c 'red, green' "nodemon server.js" "npm run client"

author: Alexis Diaz Commodore
